EntropyCountingRandom - Interface in io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom
A Random that can track its inflow and outflow of entropy (assuming that seeds have entropy equal to their length) so we can decide whether or not it needs reseeding again yet.

io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom - package io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom
BetterRandom is a library designed to help improve the quality and performance of random-number generation on Java.
io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng - package io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng
Implementations of Random.
io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng.adapter - package io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng.adapter
Implementations of Random backed by instances of SplittableRandom.
io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.seed - package io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.seed
Tools to obtain and apply truly-random seeds for Random implementations, especially those that also implement ByteArrayReseedableRandom.
io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.util - package io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.util
Miscellaneous utilities.

ReseedingSplittableRandomAdapter - Class in io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng.adapter
A version of SplittableRandomAdapter that uses a RandomSeederThread to replace each seederThread's SplittableRandom with a reseeded one as frequently as possible, but not more frequently than it is being used.

warn(String, Object...) - Method in class io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.util.LogPreFormatter
warn.
withProbability(double) - Method in class io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng.BaseRandom
The purpose of this method is so that entropy-counting subclasses can detect that no more than 1 bit of entropy is actually being consumed, even though this method uses Random.nextDouble() which normally consumes 53 bits.
withProbabilityInternal(double) - Method in class io.github.pr0methean.betterrandom.prng.BaseRandom
Called by BaseRandom.withProbability(double) to generate a boolean with a specified probability of returning true, after special cases (probability 0 or less, or 1 or more) have been eliminated.
